title: Android 12L adds scrolling screenshot support for WebViews
content:
Android 12 finally added native support for scrolling screenshots, allowing users to take full screenshots of web pages and documents. And with Android 12L, the feature is getting even better. Of course, Android 12 isn’t the first to introduce scrolling screenshots; the feature has been an integral part of other OEM skins such as MIUI

The post Android 12L adds scrolling screenshot support for WebViews appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 12L adds scroll capture support for WebViews, making it possible to take full-page screenshots of the content displayed in a WebView.
